other_tests.procedure_name: Endoscopic Ultrasound (EUS) with Fine Needle Aspiration (FNA)
other_tests.findings: Multiloculated cystic mass arising from the tail of the pancreas measuring approximately 5.3 x 4.7 x 4.3 cm, previously 3.2 x 2 x 2.3 cm, with moderate fat stranding adjacent to this lesion consistent with inflammation.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The cystic mass increased in size from 3.2 x 2 x 2.3 cm to 5.3 x 4.7 x 4.3 cm, indicating progression.

other_tests.findings: Both specimens taken were normal with no abnormal results.
